attributes.background: The Govt is facing a losing battle against the immigrants illegally entering Britain. Its costing the UK 250K A DAY on lost trade alone. In the 3 wks up to 24 July, operation stack had cost police £700,000 The army wont stop immigrants entering the country who have pledged to do so at all cost.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105337

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
